explanation: Multiple participants are bullish on BTC with targets of 108k-112k, referencing technical breakouts, dominance, and strong momentum. There is visible sentiment towards holding longs, expecting new all-time highs, and several confirmations of bullish structure (e.g., breakout of parallel channel, dominance retracement, and macro bullish factors). Many comments support buying or holding long, with few short-term doubts about a brief dip before further upside. The overall tone is highly positive with frequent references to profits, confirmed signals, and expectation of upward movement.
